apps.name: ProcrastiNOT
apps.description: Say goodbye to procrastination and hello to productivity with ProcrastiNOT! This extension is your personal productivity guardian, helping you stay focused and accomplish more, by blocking websites when your trying to get work done!

apps.name: Hide Spoilers
apps.description: Blur & Block spoilers on any website with Hide Spoilers. This extension will help you avoid spoilers for your favorite shows, movies, and games.

apps.name: AutoPause
apps.description: Ever find yourself dozing off while a video keeps playing? Or need a break but forget to pause the music? AutoPause has you covered. Set a timer, and let AutoPause handle stopping your browser's media

apps.name: Should You Test in Production?
apps.description: Should You Test in Production? A lighthearted nod to every developer's worst (or best) idea, this site redirects to the iconic Bill O'Reilly clip: 'F*** it, we'll do it live!' Because sometimes, that's just how it feels. üòÇ

apps.name: Confetti Cannon: Page Party
apps.description: Add a burst of joy to any webpage with a single click, turning your screen into a fun confetti celebration whenever you need it!

apps.name: Markdown Editor for Safari
apps.description: Create and view markdown files easily from anywhere with our simple and easy, GitHub-flavored markdown editor.

apps.name: Coco's Trivia Corner
apps.description: Coco's Trivia Corner offers over 53,000 unique and random questions to keep you entertained. Perfect for quizzes, game nights, or just challenging yourself!

apps.name: Yeti
apps.description: Customize your browsing by removing unwanted AI search results on Google‚Ñ¢ and applying your own custom CSS to any webpage.

apps.name: Instant Incognito
apps.description: Instant Incognito automatically opens specific websites in incognito mode for enhanced privacy.

apps.name: Incognito Bear
apps.description: Just one click, Incognito Bear removes all NSFW contents or a list of your own from your browsing history, so you can enjoy worry-free browsing.

apps.name: Simple Screenshot Pro
apps.description: This tool brings ease and precision to capturing entire webpages or just the visible parts.

opensource.name: Google Profanity Words
opensource.description: Full list of bad words and top swear words banned by Google.

opensource.name: Remove PII
opensource.description: Designed to help with privacy by removing personally identifiable information (PII) from text.

opensource.name: Maths Captcha
opensource.description: Maths-Captcha is a simple Node.js module that generates random math questions and verifies user answers.

graveyard.name: Forgotten Membership Cards
graveyard.description: Ever been at the checkout and realized you forgot your membership card? Quickly access discounts and rewards at popular stores, even when you‚Äôve left your card at home. Just pull up our site, scan, and save‚Äîno need to miss out on deals. Plus, find links to sign up for your own account if you‚Äôd like to earn rewards personally. Perfect for those ‚ÄúOh no!‚Äù moments at the counter!

graveyard.name: Mystery Rank
graveyard.description: Join Mystery Rank to secure your spot and climb the ranks in various categories. The more you contribute, the higher you rank‚Äîbut the twist is, you‚Äôll never know what others paid. Embrace the excitement of mystery and competition!

graveyard.name: Instant Flash Cards
graveyard.description: Turn any site into study vibes with one click. Instant Flash Cards is your hack to making learning stick.

graveyard.name: I Support Humans
graveyard.description: Take a stand for human creativity and originality. Sign the pledge, support human-made work, and download a badge to show you value people over automation.

graveyard.name: What Coffee should I have?
graveyard.description: Not sure what coffee to have in the morning? Let us pick for you with over 35 different coffees and growing.

graveyard.name: Reddit: Random subreddit button
graveyard.description: Reddits new redesign removed the random button. I wanted it back. So here it is as a chrome extension.

graveyard.name: Clean my history
graveyard.description: Sometimes you forget to delete your history after viewing NSFW sites. Clean my History is a privacy focused Chrome extension that removes over 15,000 NSFW websites and terms from your history in one click.

graveyard.name: Netflix Hidden Categories
graveyard.description: Netflix Hidden Categories for Chrome allows you to search thousands of hidden categories that Netflix hides from you.
